content:
ContextDataSourceView Class

In this Article

Supports the ContextDataSource control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform data operations.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class ContextDataSourceView : System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSourceView

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • DataSourceView
  • System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSourceView
  • ContextDataSourceView

Constructors summary

ContextDataSourceView(DataSourceControl,String,HttpContext)

Initializes a new instance of the ContextDataSourceView class.

Fields summary

EventContextCreated

Indicates that an event occurred after an instance of the context type object was created.
EventContextCreating

Indicates that an event occurs before an instance of the context type object is created.
EventContextDisposing

Indicates that an event occurs before an instance of the context type object is disposed.

Properties summary

Context

Gets or sets the current data context.
ContextType

Gets the type of the data context.
ContextTypeName

Gets or sets the name of the data context class that contains the field or property that is specified in the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName* property.
EntitySet

Gets or sets the object that contains the value of the data to retrieve.
EntitySetName

Gets or sets the name of the property or field in the data-context class that represents a data collection.
EntitySetType

Gets or sets the name of the object that is created for an insert, delete, or update operation.
EntityType

Gets or sets the object that is created for an insert, delete, or update operation.
EntityTypeName

Gets or sets the name of the object that is created for an insert, delete, or update operation.

Methods summary

CreateContext(DataSourceOperation)

Creates an instance of the data context and entity-set type for the specified operation.
DisposeContext()

Disposes the context after an operation is performed.
DisposeContext(Object)

Disposes the specified data context after an operation is performed.
ExecuteDelete(IDictionary,IDictionary)

Performs a delete operation using the specified keys and using row values that are used to detect conflicts.
ExecuteInsert(IDictionary)

Performs an insert operation by using the values specified in a collection.
ExecuteUpdate(IDictionary,IDictionary,IDictionary)

Performs an update operation by using the specified row-key values, the row values, and the row values that are used to detect conflicts.
GetDataObjectType(Type)

Retrieves the type of data object to use for the delete, insert, and update operations.
GetEntitySetType()

Retrieves the entity set as a property, field, or data context.
GetSource(QueryContext)

Retrieves the source of the query context.

Constructors

  • ContextDataSourceView(DataSourceControl,String,HttpContext)

    Initializes a new instance of the ContextDataSourceView class.

    protected ContextDataSourceView (System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl owner, string viewName, System.Web.HttpContext context);

    Parameters

    • owner
      DataSourceControl

      The data source control that the ContextDataSourceView object is associated with.

    • viewName
      String

      The unique name for the data source view in the scope of the data source control that owns it.

    • context
      HttpContext

      The current HttpContext instance.

Fields

  • EventContextCreated

    Indicates that an event occurred after an instance of the context type object was created.

    protected static readonly object EventContextCreated;
  • EventContextCreating

    Indicates that an event occurs before an instance of the context type object is created.

    protected static readonly object EventContextCreating;
  • EventContextDisposing

    Indicates that an event occurs before an instance of the context type object is disposed.

    protected static readonly object EventContextDisposing;

Properties

  • Context

    Gets or sets the current data context.

    protected object Context { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Object

      The current data context.

  • ContextType

    Gets the type of the data context.

    public virtual Type ContextType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The type that is associated with the data context class that is specified in the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSourceView.ContextTypeName* property.

  • ContextTypeName

    Gets or sets the name of the data context class that contains the field or property that is specified in the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName* property.

    public virtual string ContextTypeName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the data context class that contains the field or property that is specified in the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName* property.

  • EntitySet

    Gets or sets the object that contains the value of the data to retrieve.

    protected object EntitySet { get; }

    Property Value

    • Object

      The object that contains the value of the data to retrieve.

  • EntitySetName

    Gets or sets the name of the property or field in the data-context class that represents a data collection.

    public string EntitySetName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the property or field in the data-context class that represents a data collection.

  • EntitySetType

    Gets or sets the name of the object that is created for an insert, delete, or update operation.

    protected Type EntitySetType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The name of the object that is created for an insert, delete, or update operation.

  • EntityType

    Gets or sets the object that is created for an insert, delete, or update operation.

    protected override Type EntityType { get; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The object that is created for an insert, delete, or update operation.

  • EntityTypeName

    Gets or sets the name of the object that is created for an insert, delete, or update operation.

    public string EntityTypeName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the object that is created for an insert, delete, or update operation.

Methods

  • CreateContext(DataSourceOperation)

    Creates an instance of the data context and entity-set type for the specified operation.

    protected virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContextDataSourceContextData CreateContext (System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation operation);

    Parameters

    • operation
      DataSourceOperation

      The type of data operation to perform.

    Returns

    • ContextDataSourceContextData

      An instance of the data context and entity-set type for the specified operation.

  • DisposeContext()

    Disposes the context after an operation is performed.

    protected void DisposeContext ();
  • DisposeContext(Object)

    Disposes the specified data context after an operation is performed.

    protected virtual void DisposeContext (object dataContext);

    Parameters

    • dataContext
      Object

      The data context to dispose.

  • ExecuteDelete(IDictionary,IDictionary)

    Performs a delete operation using the specified keys and using row values that are used to detect conflicts.

    protected override int ExecuteDelete (System.Collections.IDictionary keys, System.Collections.IDictionary oldValues);

    Parameters

    • keys
      IDictionary

      A dictionary of row-key values for the records to delete.

    • oldValues
      IDictionary

      A dictionary of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their original values, which is used to detect data conflicts.

    Returns

    • Int32

      The number of objects or rows that were deleted from the data source.

  • ExecuteInsert(IDictionary)

    Performs an insert operation by using the values specified in a collection.

    protected override int ExecuteInsert (System.Collections.IDictionary values);

    Parameters

    • values
      IDictionary

      A dictionary of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their new values.

    Returns

    • Int32

      The number of objects or rows that were inserted into the data source.

  • ExecuteUpdate(IDictionary,IDictionary,IDictionary)

    Performs an update operation by using the specified row-key values, the row values, and the row values that are used to detect conflicts.

    protected override int ExecuteUpdate (System.Collections.IDictionary keys, System.Collections.IDictionary values, System.Collections.IDictionary oldValues);

    Parameters

    • keys
      IDictionary

      A dictionary of row-key values for the records to update.

    • values
      IDictionary

      A dictionary of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their new values.

    • oldValues
      IDictionary

      A dictionary of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their original values, which is used to detect data conflicts.

    Returns

    • Int32

      The number of rows that were updated in the data source.

  • GetDataObjectType(Type)

    Retrieves the type of data object to use for the delete, insert, and update operations.

    protected virtual Type GetDataObjectType (Type type);

    Parameters

    • type
      Type

      The data type of the object to use for the operation.

    Returns

    • Type

      The type of the data object that was used for the delete, insert, or update operations.

  • GetEntitySetType()

    Retrieves the entity set as a property, field, or data context.

    protected virtual Type GetEntitySetType ();

    Returns

    • Type

      The entity set that was retrieved.

  • GetSource(QueryContext)

    Retrieves the source of the query context.

    protected override object GetSource (System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryContext context);

    Parameters

    • context
      QueryContext

      The current query context.

    Returns

    • Object

      The data source to apply the query to.
